note.p: American clergyman. Of Woburn, Mass. At Amherst College, 1831–5; graduated from Andover Theological Seminary in 1838. Missionary in Syria and Beirut, 1840–4. Pastor in South Hadley, Mass., and West Amesbury (Merrimac), Mass.; preached in Wolfborough, N.H., and Woburn, Mass. Published articles on local history and genealogy.
New England Historical and Genealogical Register 51 (1897): 83.
